dcterms:description: A multilingual speech dataset derived from the Bible, containing speech utterances from 700 languages with limited speaker diversity.

dcterms:description: A large multilingual speech corpus collected from diverse speakers and recording conditions, used for validation and test sets in spoken language identification tasks.
dcterms:title: Common Voice
